q_ch: 订单产品是T恤的裁剪任务有哪些？
q_en: Which cutting tasks are for products categorized as T-shirt?
thought: To find cutting tasks for products categorized as T-shirt, we need to join the relevant tables. We'll join the 'cutting_tasks' table with 'order_product', 'products', and 'products_types' tables. We'll filter the results based on the product type description that should be 'T-shirt'.

sqls.command: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, ct.working_group_id, ct.order_product_id, ct.planned_number, ct.completed_number, ct.is_started FROM cutting_tasks ct INNER JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id INNER JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id INNER JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE pt.description = 'T-shirt';
